name: Bill Gates
previousRole: Co-founder and former CEO of Microsoft
description: Bill Gates co-founded Microsoft Corporation in 1975 and served as CEO until 2000. Under his leadership, Microsoft became the world's largest personal computer software company. He has since focused on philanthropic efforts through the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

awards.name: Presidential Medal of Freedom
awards.description: Highest civilian honor in the United States

awards.name: Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire
awards.description: Honorary knighthood for services to global healthcare and technology

awards.name: National Medal of Technology and Innovation
awards.description: For technical achievement in computer software

awards.name: Time Person of the Year
awards.description: Along with Melinda Gates and Bono for philanthropic work

vision: A world where every person has the opportunity to live a healthy, productive life through technology innovation and global healthcare initiatives.
recentDevelopments: Leading global health initiatives through Gates Foundation
